original_text: But he said, “My son shall not go down with you, for his brother is dead, and he is the only one left. If harm should happen to him on the journey that you are to make, you would bring down my gray hairs with sorrow to Sheol.”
korean_text: 야곱이 이르되 내 아들은 너희와 함께 내려가지 못하리니 그의 형은 죽고 그만 남았음이라 만일 너희가 가는 길에서 재난이 그에게 미치면 너희가 내 흰 머리를 슬퍼하며 스올로 내려가게 함이 되리라

sentences.original_text: My son shall not go down with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아들은 너희와 함께 내려가지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he is the only one left
If harm should happen to him
on the journey that you are to make
you would bring down my gray hairs
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내 흰 머리를 슬픔으로 데려갈 것이다
